title: two typophile tech questions
content:
1) does anyone know why i can’t update my icon ? ...i check “delete” next to the existing and select a new one, the new one is listed by name on my profile, but the old one remains. i’ve tried deleting and logging out, then reading a post to verify a blank space, then logging in and selecting the new icon for my profile, only to have the old one re-appear ! spooky.

is there a tech admin ?

2) do other folks see in forum categories that “critique” is the only category without: topics/posts/latest listings ? there’s some good threads in there worth tracking.

cheers.

 [‹ difference in meaning between CONDENSED and EXTENDED forms?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007003534/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30503 "Go to previous forum topic") [quotes from Robert Besley + ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007003534/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32033 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Ch

comments.content: 2) I think that’s because “Critique” has subcategories. If you click on that link they come up. I’ve always found the description “Typefaces on the chopping block” misleading, it was years before I realized there were the categories: “Logo / Corporate ID” and “Typography / Composition” buried there. I thought that Critique was about type design only. Personally I’d rather see those two topics under “Design” instead.

“1) does anyone know why i can’t update my icon ? …i check “delete” next to the existing and select a new one, the new one is listed by name on my profile, but the old one remains. i’ve tried deleting and logging out, then reading a post to verify a blank space, then logging in and selecting the new icon for my profile, only to have the old one re-appear ! spooky.”

\> after uploading your icon, try refreshing your page once.
Well since your icon has changed I guess you solved your own problem ;-)
Does anyone know how I can update Satya’s icon?

Perhaps some Warhol style colorization?

peace

<cite>Does anyone know how I can update Satya’s icon?</cite>

Icon Updated :)
Funny, it’s still the same size.

patty - i did it once but can’t do it again. oh yeah, i’m all about those upgrades...

wow ! it just worked. wierd and... refreshing !  
thanks all for generous patience with my technolexia.

now, does anyone know how i can delete this thread ? ;-)
That happened to me also. Try clearing your cache out. Works every time.
Cleared my cache, and Voilá, it appears that Satya made a funny out of Nick!
There is also the “Special Interest Groups” subforum header. It seems to get even less business than the “Critique” subforums.
David, click on ’my account’ on the right and then ’edit’.
and yes, reloading the page does the trick. thanks all.
thanks BB! now, I can work on an italic version! ;)
Wow. You’ve been a member for how long? And you’re the boss of what company? I thought you were having a social renegade fit like jpad who refused to give in to the temptation :)
